fields.name: Invoice Date and Time
fields.description: The date and time the invoice was issued

fields.name: Invoice Number
fields.description: The unique identifier for the invoice

fields.name: Order ID
fields.description: The unique identifier for the order

fields.name: Restaurant Name
fields.description: The name of the restaurant where the order was placed

fields.name: Restaurant Phone Number
fields.description: The contact number of the restaurant

fields.name: Restaurant CNPJ
fields.description: The National Register of Legal Entities (CNPJ) of the restaurant

fields.name: Restaurant UUID
fields.description: The unique identifier for the restaurant

fields.name: Payment Summary
fields.description: The summary of the payment including subtotal, delivery fee, service fee, discount, tip, and total

fields.name: Delivery Details
fields.description: The details of the delivery including delivery address, customer ID, GPS tracking ID, delivery time, and distance traveled

fields.name: Transaction ID
fields.description: The unique identifier for the transaction

fields.name: Rating Code
fields.description: The code to rate the experience
